```{r setup}
library(FAVA)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


# Visualize relative abundances

```{r}
set.seed(12)
pal = c(viridis::rocket(224), viridis::mako(300))[sample(1:524)]

Q_plot(Q = xue_microbiome_sample, 
       K = 524, 
       group = "subject", 
       arrange = "vertical") + 
  scale_color_manual(values = rep("white", 1346)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = pal)
```

# Quantify the variability of each set of relative abundances

```{r}
xue_microbiome_sample %>% 
  group_by(subject) %>%
  group_map(~ FAVA::fst(select(.x, - timepoint)))
```


```{r}
window_out = window_fava(Q = xue_microbiome_sample, K = 524, window_size = 6, group = "subject")
head(window_out)
```
